title: Ring of wizardry
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Type | Jewellery                                                                                |
| :--- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name | Ring of wizardry                                                                         |
| Icon | [![Ring of wizardry.png](/images/4/4c/Ring_of_wizardry.png)](/File:Ring_of_wizardry.png) |

|   |                                                                        |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A ring that increases the ability of its wearer to use magical spells. |

Wearing a **ring of wizardry** improves your [spell success](/Spell_success "Spell success") rate significantly. This stacks with other sources of [wizardry](/Wizardry "Wizardry"), but with diminishing returns.

## Desirability

Good for spellcasters, especially in the early game. Wizardry is always better for decreasing failure rate than a [ring of intelligence](/Ring_of_intelligence "Ring of intelligence"). For casters, the single biggest jump in power is when a spell goes from "failure is too high to be used" to "failure is low enough to be used"; wizardry can help reach that.

Once you can comfortably cast a given spell without wizardry, a ring of intelligence (which also increases [spell power](/Spell_power "Spell power")) or a defensive ring will likely be preferable. Wizardry is useless for those who aren't casting any spells to begin with.

## History

- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), a [staff of wizardry](/Staff_of_wizardry "Staff of wizardry") provided a slightly better bonus to wizardry than the ring.
- Prior to [0.8](/0.8 "0.8"), this ring would not auto-identify.

| [Jewellery](/Jewellery "Jewellery") |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |

| [Rings](/Ring "Ring")               | [Dexterity](/Ring_of_dexterity "Ring of dexterity") • [Evasion](/Ring_of_evasion "Ring of evasion") • [Fire](/Ring_of_fire "Ring of fire") • [Flight](/Ring_of_flight "Ring of flight") • [Ice](/Ring_of_ice "Ring of ice") • [Intelligence](/Ring_of_intelligence "Ring of intelligence") • [Magical power](/Ring_of_magical_power "Ring of magical power") • [Poison resistance](/Ring_of_poison_resistance "Ring of poison resistance") • [Positive energy](/Ring_of_positive_energy "Ring of positive energy") • [Protection](/Ring_of_protection "Ring of protection") • [Protection from cold](/Ring_of_protection_from_cold "Ring of protection from cold") • [Protection from fire](/Ring_of_protection_from_fire "Ring of protection from fire") • [Resist corrosion](/Ring_of_resist_corrosion "Ring of resist corrosion") • [See invisible](/Ring_of_see_invisible "Ring of see invisible") • [Slaying](/Ring_of_slaying "Ring of slaying") • [Strength](/Ring_of_strength "Ring of strength") • [Willpower](/Ring_of_willpower "Ring of willpower") • [Wizardry]() |

Ring of wizardry

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Type Jewellery
Name Ring of wizardry
Icon
A ring that increases the ability of its wearer to use magical spells.

Wearing a ring of wizardry improves your spell success rate significantly. This stacks with other sources of wizardry, but with diminishing returns.

Desirability

Good for spellcasters, especially in the early game. Wizardry is always better for decreasing failure rate than a ring of intelligence. For casters, the single biggest jump in power is when a spell goes from "failure is too high to be used" to "failure is low enough to be used"; wizardry can help reach that.

Once you can comfortably cast a given spell without wizardry, a ring of intelligence (which also increases spell power) or a defensive ring will likely be preferable. Wizardry is useless for those who aren't casting any spells to begin with.

History

  • Prior to 0.14, a staff of wizardry provided a slightly better bonus to wizardry than the ring.
  • Prior to 0.8, this ring would not auto-identify.
